Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2016 07:53AM Momandwife36 wrote: Me too about the hair. I feel so stupid for worrying about my stupid hair. In the end I would rather not have cancer than keep my hair...but it feels pretty devastating. I start chemo November 1st, so if anyone is interested in getting the low down...I'd be happy to have someone to commiserate with too! PMs are most welcome. Wish everyone the best of luck.
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo in Nov 2016 Sorella aterry
